document.full_text: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala cemented his lead in peru's presidential race, polls showed sunday, as he promised investors he would manage the economy prudently despite his radical past.
document.title: peru front-runner humala aims to assuage investors
lines_and_colors: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala cemented his lead in peru's presidential race, polls showed sunday, as he promised investors he would manage the economy prudently despite his radical past.
